TopicTitle: [BluPlanet Inc.] Sigma 1 Interplanetary Ship-Rated for Jool

Articles.Content:
-Built by Beeftenderloin, description/pictures by beeftenderloin

The Sigma 1 is a launch vehicle designed for interplanetary travel. It is rated for trips out to Jool and back, but it can reach any destination in the Kerbol system. The model you will receive in the post will come with one free* probe!

http://www./view/6k4jv4y66kjftc1/Sigma_1_Probe.craft

*Free equals all the money you own (so the poorer you are, the more you save!)

Edited October 5, 2013 by Kerbol Prime
Oh good! I spent all my money on pizza.
